mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(advert_idx) FROM advert WHERE qrboard_idx = #{qrboardIdx} AND advert_state = 3

SELECT q.qrboard_name, q.qrboard_idx, q.qrboard_approve_stime, q.qrboard_approve_etime, q.template_idx, qa.qrboard_area_seq, u.user_email, u.user_tel,l.layout_name, ts.template_shop_name, a.advert_idx, a.content_idx, a.advert_name, a.advert_user_name, a.advert_user_ci, a.advert_user_tel, a.advert_state, a.advert_sdate, a.advert_edate, a.advert_price FROM advert a INNER JOIN qrboard q ON a.qrboard_idx = q.qrboard_idx INNER JOIN qrboard_area qa ON a.qrboard_area_idx = qa.qrboard_area_idx INNER JOIN layout l ON q.layout_idx = l.layout_idx INNER JOIN template_shop ts ON a.template_shop_idx = ts.template_shop_idx INNER JOIN user u ON q.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE a.advert_idx = #{advertIdx}
SELECT * FROM content_text WHERE content_idx = #{contentIdx} ORDER BY content_text_idx
SELECT * FROM content_image WHERE content_idx = #{contentIdx} ORDER BY content_image_idx
SELECT * FROM content_background WHERE content_idx = #{contentIdx} ORDER BY content_background_idx
